nodes.text: This female was the wife of pilot Bors Kenlin who resided on the planet Thyferra.

During the Bacta War, Ysanne Isard, who seized control of the planet, issued a threat that the families of cargo tanker pilots would be killed if the pilots surrendered their cargo of bacta to Wedge Antilles, who along with former members of Rogue Squadron were preying on delivery convoys. Despite the threat, Kenlin gladly surrendered his ship and cargo to Antilles. According to him, Isard would be doing him a favor by killing his wife.
